turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Susan, would you please order a few pizzas from the local Dominoes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, Brian. Please let me know which pizzas you want to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have one pepperoni, one cheese and one sausage pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any extra toppings are anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like extra cheese on the cheese pizza and a 2 liter coke please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are out of 2 liter cokes. Would you like another option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please change to a Sprite instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have ordered 3 large pizzas and a 2 liter Sprite, as requested.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thank you! Could you also tell them to throw in some buffalo wings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, how many wings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, let's go with 10 wings

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, 10 wings have been added to the order. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, my wife wants to make one adjustment. Please change the sausage pizza to a bbq chicken pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, order adjusted. Removed the large sausage pizza and replaced with a large bbq chicken pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, did you order all the pizzas as large sizes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I did is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but now I would like to adjust the cheese pizza to a medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have adjusted the cheese pizza to a medium size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizza order is complete and will be ready to pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great!
